product.name: DataInsight Pro
product.description: A cloud-based SaaS analytics platform for business intelligence and data visualization.

data_export.description: Export your data and reports in multiple formats

csv.name: CSV Export
csv.description: Export raw data as comma-separated values
csv.how_to:
1. Open any dashboard or report
2. Click the '...' menu in the top right
3. Select 'Export' > 'CSV'
4. Choose columns to include
5. Click 'Download'

pdf.name: PDF Export
pdf.description: Export formatted reports as PDF documents
pdf.how_to:
1. Open the dashboard you want to export
2. Click the '...' menu in the top right
3. Select 'Export' > 'PDF'
4. Choose page size and orientation
5. Click 'Generate PDF'

excel.name: Excel Export
excel.description: Export data with formatting to Microsoft Excel
excel.how_to:
1. Open the report or data view
2. Click the '...' menu
3. Select 'Export' > 'Excel'
4. Choose to include charts or data only
5. Click 'Download'

api.name: API Export
api.description: Programmatic access to export data via REST API

scheduled_exports.description: Automatically export and deliver reports on a schedule
scheduled_exports.how_to:
1. Go to Settings > Scheduled Exports
2. Click 'New Schedule'
3. Select the dashboard/report
4. Choose format (CSV, PDF, Excel)
5. Set frequency and time
6. Add recipients or delivery destination
7. Click 'Save Schedule'

dashboards.description: Create interactive dashboards to visualize your data

solutions: Check your plan supports the export format
Ensure you have 'Export' permission in your role
Try a smaller date range (exports over 100k rows may timeout)
Clear browser cache and try again
Verify email address/SFTP credentials are correct
Check the dashboard hasn't been deleted
Ensure your plan still supports scheduled exports
Contact support if the issue persists
